mapper.insert: INSERT INTO VAM_BOOK( BOOKNAME, AUTHORID, PUBLEYEAR, PUBLISHER, CATECODE, BOOKPRICE, BOOKSTOCK, BOOKDISCOUNT, BOOKINTRO, BOOKCONTENTS )VALUES( #{bookName}, #{authorId}, #{publeYear}, #{publisher}, #{cateCode}, #{bookPrice}, #{bookStock}, #{bookDiscount}, #{bookIntro}, #{bookContents})
